name: Lost in Time (itch) (Haqufa)
description:
Kelompok 11 (Elephant)

Controls:

"W" for moving up

"S" for moving down

"A" for moving left

"D" for moving right

Right click to use the sword

*Note:

- Jika saat full screen tidak bisa bergerak, tekan tombol "Tab"

- Karena belum ada tombol untuk replay, jika ingin replay silahkan muat ulang halaman
